channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 16:28 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 16:28 Air alert in Dnipropetrovsk region. Follow further messages. #Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 16:20 Repel the threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 16:20 Repel the threat of shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further messages. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 16:18 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Miriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
